extendedIngredients.name: candy melts
extendedIngredients.originalString: ½ Cup Blue Candy Melts, melted

extendedIngredients.originalString: ½ Cup Red Candy Melts, melted

extendedIngredients.name: caramels

recipes.title: Fireworks Pretzel Snaps
recipes.instructions: Break the pretzel sticks into 3 or 4 pieces.Place a dollop of white chocolate on a silpat or parchment followed by the pretzel pieces to form stars or fireworks. Drizzle a small dollop of caramel in the center followed by red, white and blue candy melt drizzles. Sugar sprinkles or gold sprinkles optional.Store in airtight containers for up to 1 week.

steps.step: Break the pretzel sticks into 3 or 4 pieces.
Place a dollop of white chocolate on a silpat or parchment followed by the pretzel pieces to form stars or fireworks.
Drizzle a small dollop of caramel in the center followed by red, white and blue candy melt drizzles. Sugar sprinkles or gold sprinkles optional.Store in airtight containers for up to 1 week.
